__e: My dear Elena I can't get up any more, - I feel that I'll never get up ever again.
I want you to know I'm not mad at you.
No, of course I haven 't left Helen.
'Oh, this is Helen from prison, by the way.'
But she better fuck him like Helen of Troy with her arse on fire, or I'll know the reason why.
I promised your friend Hélene I'd help you, but I need you to tell me all you can, clear?
